inclusion.criterion: received HD treatment three times each week for not less than three months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: history of CVD or underlying renal disease were eligible
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: absence of chest pain, dyspnea on exertion, paroxysmal nocturnal dyspnea, orthopnea, palpitations, syncope or presyncope
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patent right ACA and MCA and patent left ACA and left MCA
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: 80% stenosis of the R ICA and a 90% L ICA stenosis
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients receiving treatment with sevelamer hydrochloride were not eligible for study participation
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: known sensitivity to either sevelamer hydrochloride or calcum carbonate
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has significant carotid stenosis, but no prior syncope and absence of other symptoms. Patent right ACA and MCA and patent left ACA and left MCA.
